title: 22: Behavioral Econ in Developing Nations
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: Today we’re joined by special guest, creator and former host of Mad Hat Economics, Roberto Figari.  We discuss Roberto’s work in implementing behavioral economics strategies in developmental situations in Africa.
